}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "10030831 V1.1" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
The device uses Broadcom BCM60350 as the HomePlug controller.
Sold as part of the Tenda PH10 ''AV1000 ac Wi-Fi Powerline Extender Kit'' which includes this PA7 with a [[Tenda P3]] powerline adapter. This device does not appear to support configuration as single band with two-stream operation like the [[ZyXEL PLA5236]] with similar hardware does. It is configured to use the [[Broadcom]] BCM47189B0 in 2x 1x1:1 mode.
* Web GUI: http://plc.tendawifi.com
==Links of Interest== * [https://scoop.co.za/tenda-1000m-dual-band-ac-wifi-eop-kit-pa7-p3-ph10.html ''Tenda 1000M Dual Band AC WiFi EoP Kit PA7+P3 | PH10'' on '''Scoop'''] : [https://scoop.co.za/download/tenda/PH10.pdf PH10 Datasheet]
[[Category:English Documentation]]
